text.section: In addition to any other charges authorized under this division, the Commission may impose a system development charge that shall be paid by an applicant for new service.

The system development charge shall be paid as follows:
for residential properties:
50% at the time the plumbing permit application is filed; and
50% within 12 months after the earlier of the date on which a plumbing permit application is filed or on transfer of title to the property; and
for other properties, 100% at the time the plumbing permit application is filed.

When the applicant files the plumbing permit application, the applicant shall deposit with the Commission security:
in the form of an irrevocable letter of credit;
in the form of a financial guaranty bond; or
in a form the Commission establishes and approves under its regulations.
